H0.text: According to legend, who was the father of King Arthur. Urian

H1.text: According to legend, who was the father of King Arthur. Gorlois

H2.text: According to legend, who was the father of King Arthur. Cerdic

H3.text: According to legend, who was the father of King Arthur. Üther

A4.text: Uther Pendragon ( (Y)OO-thər pen-DRAG-ən; the Brittonic name; Welsh: Uthyr Pen Ddraig, Uthyr Pendragon or Uthr Bendragon), also known as King Uther (or Uter), was a legendary King of the Britons and father of King Arthur.

A5.text: Merlin magically disguises Uther to look like his enemy Gorlois, enabling Uther to sleep with Gorlois' wife Lady Igraine.
